humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides a microscopic measurement of the invasive lobular carcinoma as 6.6 cm. Based on the rules provided, T3 tumors are more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The tumor size is reported as 6.6 cm, which falls under the T3 category in the pTNM staging system (AJCC, 7th edition, 2010) for breast cancer. T3 stage is defined as a tumor size of more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T3.
